name: SportsHubFlashBriefing
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Developer Terms of Use
des: Get the latest sports headlines covering the New England Patriots, Boston Bruins, Boston Celtics, Boston Red Sox, and the New England Revolution, as well as national sports stories from Boston's Home for Sports, 98.5 The Sports Hub.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
